data.title: Best BQ rips
data.text: Great! 5 friendly people , the owner is very friendly food is outstanding. Service great! Would advice other people to go if they love Rips ! Had a rip sandwich was small and the right flavor. Fries are freshly made! We sat in the patio was comfee and open! Music  relaxing!

data.title: Hambones
data.text: The food is good, service is good but they serve small portions for the prices they charge and it is medium priced. Expect to pay minimum $20.00 a person with a soft drink. Small bar area

data.title: Great BBQ
data.text:
NOTE: This review is for Hambone’s Bar & Grill on Belmont.  Not the one on Alondra.  Tripadvisor needs to clean up their database

We really enjoy dining here. Got to meet the owner shortly after they opened and he gave the wife a tour of their big ole smoker. We have yet to find anything bad at this place. We love the brisket, pulled pork, ribs & chicken. The mac & cheese is great. Beans are tasty but my fav is Hoppin John. And if you don't have room for dessert take some to go. We love the banana pudding best. You can't go wrong by dining here or taking food to go.

data.title: Great Food
data.text: Excellent, customer service with great food = Win Win! I had the baby back ribs, mac & cheese, lunch special

data.title: Great BBQ and flavor!
data.text: Ordered platters of ribs, brisket, chicken and links which was very flavorful and tender.  The brisket and ribs were very tender to the point that you could cut them with a fork!  The mac and cheese and greens was some of the best from a restaurant that I have eaten.  Service for a group of 8 was excellent.  The inside is cozy and the patio is cozy as well but big enough for about 16 people to sit out on a nice warm sunny day.

data.title: A-M-A-Z-I-N-G!
data.text: This place has a great location and fabulous food.  Prices were good and the service was excellent.  Check it out.

data.title: Great bbq. High price.
data.text: I love the mac n cheese but its very expensive to buy it as a side. Everything else is great. The staff are very polite and welcoming.

data.title: Good Food!
data.text:
Hambones food is delicious! Their  Mac N Cheese is sooo good! Wish I had some right now! 
I love their ribs - I highly recommend this place!

data.title: Southern Q. Sooo good.
data.text:
I have been meaning to try this Hambone's for a long time and finally got around to it. (The other Hambones on Alondra in Bellflower is not associated, according to the Hambones on Alondra.)  The place on Belmont Street (reviewed here) is better known as Hambones Bar and Grill and they now have a location in Huntington Beach.

Ordered food to go, but place appears nice to eat at and servers were all enthusiastic and friendly.  Outdoor patio looks out on a neighborhood piazza. 

I ordered a tri-tip sandwich and burger, fries and sweet potato fries, and a peach cobbler as a sampler of the menu on a Friday night.  Based on the tri-tip, I bet the meat entrees are all excellent.  It was tender and delicious.  The burger was my standardized test on the order and they came out with an exceptional score.  Fries and sweet potato fries were both great (I'ld go sweet potato if I had to choose).  The peach cobbler was advertised as the best thing you put in your mouth and I won't argue the claim;  I did wish I got a bit more crust (because it was so good) and they could not make this dessert any sweeter.

I will be back to Hambones.

data.title: Great food!
data.text: We ate at Hambones BBQ for the first time on a friend's recommendation and it definitely won't be the last! The brisket is in the top three that I have ever had and I have eaten a lot of BBQ in my time. It melts in your mouth and you can't stop eating it! Their BBQ sauce tastes amazing and the corn bread and coleslaw were great too. Excellent place for lunch or dinner anytime!

data.title: If you like your bbq sauce on the sweet side, you will like it here!!!
data.text: I happen to like a sweet bbq sauce but not everyone does so this is just to let you know before you go!!!!

data.title: Tasteeeee place !!!!
data.text: Have been to Hambones 3 times now and always a great meal .....have tried different things on their menu and all of them very tasteeeeeee...........staff very nice too........

data.title: Try the 99 cent Taco Tuesday!
data.text:
The staff is really friendly and the food is very good. I like the smokey brisket and the hamburgers are tasty. My favorite is to stop on Tuesday and order 99 cent tacos (using the bbq meet). They have chicken, pork, beef, brisket all available for the tacos (I think they're 1.99 regularly).

I recommend calling ahead, they are made with care and take a good 15 minutes to prepare. 

I especially like the price because my standard feeling is that bbq (not just here, but everywhere) tends to be a little pricier than I think it's worth. It's hard to get out of a bbq place for under $10 per person. The portions are standard and the flavor is tasty.

data.title: Bomb!
data.text:
Lunch is the best time to go it's hella cheaper. I got the 3 meat lunch combo with Mac n cheese and green beans...it was great and I got plenty of food. The brisket was so tender it breaks apart with a fork..tasted amazing.
A must try.

data.title: Yum!!!!
data.text: Small place, but its well worth it. The ribs are awesome. Must try the Mac and cheese. Service was very good.....call in your order, its  faster.

data.title: Great food
data.text:
I had the bbq tri ip sandwich and it was really good. The bbq sauce was great too. My daughters had the chicken wings and they were excellent as well. The fries are steak fries and seasoned and would be better if they were crispier..I had the onion rings which were just okay.. 

The food took a little while to get, about 25 minutes but it was worth the wait.
